title: BONUS: Steve Lacy On Finding A Place In Music, The Internet, + Black Musicians
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Artist Steve Lacy sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a variety of topics including how Black musicians are portrayed in the music business, how he fell in love with music, talent in high school and more! He also discusses working with The Internet, some of the most notable tracks hes worked on, and more! His album 'Gemini Rights' is available now.

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/7ce3df43-baea-467a-9c40-065a397f4b4d/captains-majors---the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6ZuO0qvyWoeo3KxNutMxg6?si=50e84457edf147fa 

Production Assistance by: David

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
